import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './verticalmenu.css'; // Adjust the path as necessary import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import backgroundLogo from '../images/Carecloud.png'; import Set_Up from '../images/Set_up.png'; import Plus from '../images/istockphoto-832142860-612x612__1_-removebg-preview.png'; const VerticalMenu = () => { const [activeMenu, setActiveMenu] = useState(null); const [showAddUserModal, setShowAddUserModal] = useState(false); // State for Add System User modal // Toggle dropdown menu const toggleDropdown = (menu) => { setActiveMenu((prevMenu) => (prevMenu === menu ? null : menu)); }; // Modal handlers for Add System Users const openAddUserModal = () => setShowAddUserModal(true); const closeAddUserModal = () => setShowAddUserModal(false); return (
    {/* Set Up Menu with Dropdown */}
  • toggleDropdown('Set up')}>
    Set Up
     {activeMenu === 'Set up' && (
    • {/* Add System Users: Opens Modal */}
      Add System Users
    • Manage System Users
    • Users Log Activity
    )}

Firstname: Surname: Staff Designation: Email Address: Phone: Password: Repeat Password:
); }; export default VerticalMenu;
